scripts.prepare:sdk: rimraf sdk-patched && cd interface_sdk-js/build-tools && npm i && node handleApiFiles --path .. --type ets --output ../../sdk-patched
scripts.compile: npm run compile --prefix external/incremental/compat && npm run compile --prefix external/incremental/common && npm run compile --prefix external/interop
scripts.release: npm run compile && npm run -C arkgen compile && npm run -C core compile && npm run -C linter compile && node tools/release.mjs
scripts.sanity: npm run -C arkgen sanity && npm run -C linter run
